mapper.insert: INSERT INTO used_bbs(usedNum, userId, subject, content, hitCount, created_date, price, productCondition, dealingMode, location, sold_check, categoryNum) VALUES(#{usedNum}, #{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, SYSDATE, #{price}, #{productCondition}, #{dealingMode}, #{location}, 0, #{categoryNum})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM used_bbs u JOIN member m ON u.userId=m.userId

SELECT u.usedNum, u.userId, userName,c.categoryName, subject, sold_check, hitCount, TO_CHAR(created_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') created_date, NVL(fileCount,0)fileCount, categoryName FROM used_bbs u JOIN member m ON u.userId = m.userId LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT usedNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM used_image GROUP BY usedNum ) f ON u.usedNum = f.usedNum JOIN used_category c ON c.categoryNum = u.categoryNum
mapper.update: UPDATE used_bbs SET hitCount=hitCount+1 WHERE usedNum = #{usedNum}
mapper.select: SELECT usedNum, subject FROM used_bbs WHERE usedNum > #{usedNum} ORDER BY usedNum ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
SELECT usedNum, subject FROM used_bbs WHERE usedNum < #{usedNum} ORDER BY usedNum DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT u.usedNum, u.userId, userName, price, productCondition, dealingMode, location, subject,content,TO_CHAR(created_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') created_date, sold_check, categoryName, hitCount, NVL(fileCount,0)fileCount FROM used_bbs u JOIN member m ON u.userId = m.userId JOIN used_image i ON u.usedNum = i.usedNum JOIN used_category c ON c.categoryNum = u.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN( SELECT usedNum, COUNT(*) fileCount FROM used_image GROUP BY usedNum ) f ON u.usedNum = f.usedNum WHERE u.usedNum = #{usedNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO used_image(used_imageFileNum, imageFilename, usedNum) VALUES (usedFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{imageFilename}, #{usedNum})
